}}'''''Minecraft'': Guide to Creative''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Thomas McBrien]], meant to help introduce players to creative mode. Alongside many diagrams and explanations are several special passages from YouTubers, including [https://www.jeracraft.net/ Jeracraft], [[Wattles]], Team Visionary, and [https://varunabuilds.com/ Varuna].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
Ignite your imagination and embrace your creativity with the ''Minecraft Guide to Creative''â€”the only book you'll need to take your [[Creative|creative]] skills to the next level.

Follow step-by-step instructions to complete your first builds, discover top tips on lighting, build themes and so much more. Includes expert advice from pro builders to inspire you to get creative!}}

== Contents ==
Each page consists of various building techniques and practical advice, with various renders of blocks, builds, or [[Steve]] and [[Alex]] demonstrating. Alongside the table of contents is an introduction, Hello, placed on the fifth page, and a final page, Goodbye, on the 95th,

=== Creative 101 ===

* What is Creative Mode?, 8-9
* Best Practices, 10-11
* Types of Blocks, 12-13
* Know Your Blocks, 14-15
* Choose Your Blocks, 16-17
* Exploring Themes with: Jeracraft, 18-19
* Lighting & Effects, 20-25
* Biomes & Sub-Biomes, 26-29
* Terraforming Landscapes, 30-31
* Creative Commands, 32-33

=== Construction ===

* Shapes & Structures, 36-41
* Block Hacks: Interiors, 42-45
* Block Hacks: Exteriors, 46-49
* Using Shapes With: Wattles, 50-51
* Construction Combos, 52-53

=== Builds ===

* Glorious Greenhouse, 56-59
* Enchanted Forest Cottage, 60-65
* Coral Cove Habitat, 66-73
* Trade Tricks With: Team Visionary, 74-75
* Futuristic Compound, 76-83
* Finding Inspiration With: Varuna, 84-85
* Medieval Manor, 86-93
